about.title: About Me
about.description1: Hi, I'm {{name}}! I'm a Front-end Developer and Embedded Software Enthusiast with a passion for building innovative web and IoT applications.
about.description2: I specialize in React, Arduino, ESP32, and MicroPython, creating seamless integrations between web interfaces and embedded systems.

arduino_app.title: Arduino Drag-and-Drop App
arduino_app.description: A React Native app for programming Arduino with a drag-and-drop interface and Bluetooth upload.
